short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Cognism Signatures, for more through your email signatures
short.de: Cognism Signatures, für mehr durch Ihre E-Mail-Signaturen
short.ro: Cognism Signatures, pentru un plus prin semnătura din email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EasySync allows you and your colleagues to use your assigned signatures and campaign banners from Cognism Signatures within your Gmail account. 

The benefits with EasySync are:  

➤ You can choose from multiple email signatures; not just one. 

➤ Use default signatures for “New Messages” and “Replies / Forwards”. 

➤ EasySync is a Chrome extension that can be easily installed by any employee or centrally by IT on all workstations. 

➤ If the admin makes changes to the signatures in Cognism Signatures, the customized signatures are immediately available for the Gmail user. 

➤ You can connect our platform and EasySync to your company's Google Workspace account. 
 

Experience the advantages of the EasySync integration! More information is available on our website. 

************************************************************************** 
WE LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU 
 
You have questions or comments? We would love to hear from you, so please reach out to us at signatures@cognism.com.
